headline: Apollo-Backed Athora Buys U.K. Insurer for $7.8 Billion
summary: The acquisition of Pension Insurance Corp. would effectively turn the specialist insurer into Athora’s U.K. insurance business.

raw.headline: Apollo-Backed Athora Buys U.K. Insurer for $7.8 Billion
raw.summary: The acquisition of Pension Insurance Corp. would effectively turn the specialist insurer into Athora’s U.K. insurance business.

headline: Apollo Global Management (NYSE:APO) Names Kristiane Kinahan As Chief Accounting Officer
summary: Apollo Global Management (NYSE:APO) recently announced Kristiane Kinahan as its new Chief Accounting Officer, while also witnessing a 16% price increase last quarter. This growth aligns closely with the broader market's uptrend, where indices achieved record highs following robust employment data and positive economic indicators. Apollo's initiatives, such as launching Olympus Housing Capital and forming partnerships to expand private credit investments, likely added weight to this positive...

headline: Advisors Start Cramming to Meet Growing Private Market Demand
summary: Apollo Global Management CEO Marc Rowan believes that allocations to private markets will make up a third of client portfolios in the future.

headline: ‘We’re in a hurry, OK?’: How Athene’s new CEO leads a hard-charging insurer
summary: The Apollo-backed group’s new CEO looks for people who can make decisions quickly — and not look back.
